name: cypress-env-test
description: Test for Cypress Plugin | Integrate the power of AWS Secrets Manager seamlessly into your Cypress tests with the cypress-env plugin. This lightweight yet powerful plugin facilitates the secure loading of secrets stored in AWS Secrets Manager directly into your Cypress environment variables.

scripts.cy:open: npx cypress open --e2e -b chrome -e envName=test,everywhere=fromScript --config baseUrl=https://www.fromScript.com

author: alec-js
